description: You wouldn't think Mac Savage was into the bear lifestyle but it is well known that the guy is an avid fur hunter, and today ol' Mac has snared himself a Rhino. The Rhino is a big, beautiful catch who is ready to show Mac just how hairy things can get. That's music to Mac's ears, as he mounts his trophy and rides him to his heart's content. The Rhino bends him over and pounds him from behind, pulling out and nutting all over him as Mac strokes himself clean, shooting his load all over himself as The Rhino looks on with pleasure.Enjoy!
title: Mac Savage: Chaser of Fur
